app.title: Krishi Sakhi
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Smart farming insights and weather monitoring
dashboard.higherValuesMean: Higher values mean higher chance of rain
dashboard.aiRecommendations: AI-powered recommendations based on current conditions
dashboard.highTempAlert: High temperature detected. Increase irrigation frequency and provide shade for sensitive crops.
dashboard.lowTempAlert: Low temperature. Consider covering sensitive plants and reduce watering.
dashboard.highHumidityAlert: High humidity increases disease risk. Ensure good air circulation and avoid overhead watering.
dashboard.lowHumidityAlert: Low humidity. Increase watering frequency and consider mulching to retain moisture.
dashboard.strongWindsAlert: Strong winds detected. Avoid spraying pesticides and secure any loose structures.
dashboard.highRainAlert: High rain probability this week. Plan irrigation accordingly and harvest if ready.
marketplace.title: Nearby Market Places
marketplace.subtitle: Discover local markets and trading centers
marketplace.searchPlaceholder: Search markets by name, location, or district...
marketplace.noMarketsDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or filter criteria to find more markets.
marketplace.marketDescriptions.nedumanga: One of the largest wholesale markets in Kerala, specializing in vegetables, fruits, and spices.
marketplace.marketDescriptions.anayara: Modern urban wholesale market with state-of-the-art facilities for fresh produce trading.
marketplace.marketDescriptions.spices: Specialized market for spices, particularly cardamom, pepper, and other hill spices.
marketplace.marketDescriptions.vfpck: Direct farmer-to-consumer market operated by Vegetable and Fruit Promotion Council Kerala.
marketplace.marketDescriptions.horticorp: Government-operated horticultural markets providing quality assurance and fair pricing.
marketplace.marketDescriptions.rpm: Traditional rural markets operating on specific days, connecting farmers with local consumers.
schemes.title: Government Schemes
schemes.subtitle: Explore government schemes and programs for farmers
schemes.info.title: Important Information
schemes.info.description: Click on any scheme to learn more about eligibility, benefits, and application process.
chat.title: Assistant
chat.welcomeMessage: How can I help you today?
profile.title: Farmer & Farm Profiling
profile.subtitle: Capture key details — location, land size, crop, soil, irrigation.
profile.name: Farmer Name
activity.title: Activity Tracking
activity.subtitle: Log sowing, irrigation, input use, pest issues in simple language.
activity.placeholder: e.g., 'I irrigated the paddy field today morning for 30 minutes'
advisory.title: Personalized Advisory
advisory.subtitle: Proactive, contextual guidance for your farm.
advisory.highTempDescription: Temperatures are expected to reach 38°C today. Increase irrigation frequency and provide shade for sensitive crops.
advisory.highTempAction: Water crops in early morning and evening. Use shade nets if available.
advisory.rainProbabilityDescription: 70% chance of rain in the next 3 days. Plan irrigation accordingly and harvest if ready.
advisory.rainProbabilityAction: Reduce irrigation and prepare for potential flooding in low areas.
advisory.pestDescription: Aphid infestation detected in your area. Early treatment recommended to prevent crop damage.
advisory.pestAction: Apply neem oil spray or contact your local agricultural extension officer.
advisory.soilMoistureDescription: Soil moisture levels are below optimal. Consider increasing irrigation frequency.
advisory.soilMoistureAction: Water deeply and add organic mulch to retain moisture.
advisory.harvestDescription: Your rice crop is ready for harvest. Optimal timing is crucial for maximum yield.
advisory.harvestAction: Check grain maturity and plan harvest for early morning hours.
advisory.equipmentDescription: Your irrigation pump requires maintenance. Schedule service to avoid breakdowns during peak season.
advisory.equipmentAction: Contact local service center or schedule maintenance appointment.
advisory.marketPriceDescription: Rice prices have increased by 15% in local markets. Consider selling if you have surplus stock.
advisory.marketPriceAction: Check current market rates and plan your selling strategy.
advisory.fertilizerDescription: It's time to apply nitrogen fertilizer to your paddy fields for optimal growth.
advisory.fertilizerAction: Apply 25kg urea per acre and ensure proper irrigation after application.
advisory.weatherDescription: Heavy rainfall and strong winds expected. Secure your farm equipment and protect vulnerable crops.
advisory.weatherAction: Move equipment to covered areas and use protective covers for sensitive plants.
advisory.seedDescription: Treat your seeds with fungicide before sowing to prevent soil-borne diseases.
advisory.seedAction: Use recommended fungicide and follow proper seed treatment procedures.
advisory.irrigationDescription: Adjust your irrigation schedule based on current weather conditions and crop growth stage.
advisory.irrigationAction: Reduce frequency during rainy periods and increase during dry spells.
reminders.title: Reminders & Alerts

settings.notificationsDescription: Configure how you receive alerts and updates
settings.alertsDescription: Receive reminders for tasks, weather, and schemes.
settings.pushDescription: Get instant notifications on your device
settings.ttsDescription: Read out advisories in your language.
settings.darkModeDescription: Switch between light and dark themes
settings.privacyDescription: Control your data and privacy settings
settings.dataSharingDescription: Share anonymous data to improve the app
settings.analyticsDescription: Help improve the app with usage analytics
settings.storageDescription: Manage your app data and storage
voice.info: Use the mic to speak in Malayalam or English.

landing.hero.title: Smart Farming Made Simple
landing.hero.subtitle: AI-powered insights for Kerala's farmers. Track crops, predict weather, manage costs, and boost yields.
landing.features.title: Everything you need for smart farming
landing.features.crop.title: Crop Monitoring
landing.features.crop.desc: Track growth stages, detect diseases early, and get personalized recommendations.
landing.features.weather.title: Weather Forecast
landing.features.weather.desc: Accurate 7-day weather predictions tailored to your location and crops.
landing.features.disease.title: Disease Detection
landing.features.disease.desc: Upload photos to identify plant diseases and get treatment recommendations.
landing.features.prices.title: Market Prices
landing.features.prices.desc: Real-time crop prices and market trends to maximize your profits.
landing.features.cost.title: Cost Management
landing.features.cost.desc: Track expenses, calculate profits, and optimize your farming budget.
landing.features.voice.title: Voice Commands
landing.features.voice.desc: Control the app with voice commands in Malayalam or English.
landing.cta.title: Ready to transform your farming?
landing.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers already using Krishi Sakhi to boost their yields and profits.
